plot outline: Savvy Suriya is an acquaintance of a crime lord. He does challenging jobs for his boss to be able pay for his disabled sister's hospital bills. A situation arises where his sister becomes the witness of a crime committed by Suriya's boss. When his boss finds out Suriya attempts to save his sister's life amidst many deceptions. What happens next forms the crux of the story.
title: Supari Surya
plot: A hard working man who tries to save money for his disabled sister learns that she accidentally becomes a witness to a crime committed by his boss.

Savvy Suriya is an acquaintance of a crime lord. He does challenging jobs for his boss to be able pay for his disabled sister's hospital bills. A situation arises where his sister becomes the witness of a crime committed by Suriya's boss. When his boss finds out Suriya attempts to save his sister's life amidst many deceptions. What happens next forms the crux of the story.
